[telegram] <Regnar> #KMD Komodo is one of the most undervalued coins in all of crypto at the moment. Let us give you an easy-to-understand-analogy:
-Most platform projects offer a box of scrap metal and blueprints for how to build your "car." That's helpful. But...
-KMD gives you the keys to an already built super car that has a lifetime warranty and is insured. 
In our opinion, they've got:
-better dICO platform than ETH
-are far more decentralized than EOS
-have better privacy than XMR
-is faster and more secure than BTC (approaching 1,000,000 tx/sec)
No brainer at these prices. Don't say we didn't tell you so. üöÄüíØ
